value_claims.claim_title: EchoStar Hughes projected 35,000 work hours saved and 25% productivity boost
value_claims.claim_description: EchoStar Hughes division created 12 production apps using Azure AI Foundry for sales call auditing, customer retention analysis, and field services automation, projected to save 35,000 work hours and boost productivity by at least 25%.
value_claims.source_quote: EchoStar Hughes division leveraged Microsoft Azure AI Foundry to create 12 new production apps...projected to save 35,000 work hours and boost productivity by at least 25%.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Azure AI Foundry directly enabled creation of 12 production apps that generate the stated work hour savings and productivity gains

value_claims.claim_title: Brisbane Catholic Education educators save 9.3 hours per week
value_claims.claim_description: Brisbane Catholic Education used Microsoft 365 Copilot and Copilot Studio to develop a generative AI tool integrating Catholic traditions into classrooms. Educators reported saving an average of 9.3 hours per week.
value_claims.source_quote: Brisbane Catholic Education equips Microsoft 365 Copilot and utilizes Microsoft Copilot Studio...Educators reported saving an average of 9.3 hours per week.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Microsoft 365 Copilot and Copilot Studio directly enabled the generative AI tool that produced the time savings

value_claims.claim_title: BKW processed media inquiries 50% faster with Edison platform
value_claims.claim_description: BKW developed Edison platform using Azure AI Foundry and Azure OpenAI services. Within two months, 8% of staff actively used it, media inquiries were processed 50% faster, and more than 40 use cases were documented.
value_claims.source_quote: BKW developed Edison...Within two months of its roll-out, 8% of staff were actively using Edison, media inquiries were processed 50% faster, and more than 40 use cases were documented.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Edison platform built on Azure AI services directly enabled the 50% faster processing of media inquiries

value_claims.claim_title: BKW achieved 8% staff adoption of Edison within two months
value_claims.claim_description: Within two months of Edison platform roll-out at BKW, 8% of staff were actively using the AI solution built on Azure AI Foundry and Azure OpenAI services.
value_claims.source_quote: Within two months of its roll-out, 8% of staff were actively using Edison
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Edison platform adoption directly measured as percentage of staff using the AI solution

value_claims.claim_title: HELLENiQ ENERGY boosted productivity by 70% and reduced email processing time by 64%
value_claims.claim_description: HELLENiQ ENERGY partnered with PwC to introduce Microsoft 365 Copilot and Copilot Studio, achieving a 70% productivity boost and 64% reduction in email processing time.
value_claims.source_quote: HELLENiQ ENERGY partnered with PwC to introduce Microsoft 365 Copilot and Copilot Studio to boost its productivity by 70% and reduced email processing time by 64%.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Microsoft 365 Copilot and Copilot Studio directly enabled the productivity and email processing improvements

value_claims.claim_title: Ma'aden saved up to 2,200 hours monthly with Microsoft 365 Copilot
value_claims.claim_description: Ma'aden used Microsoft 365 Copilot to enhance productivity, saving up to 2,200 hours monthly through more efficient email drafting, document creation, and data analysis.
value_claims.source_quote: Ma'aden used Microsoft 365 Copilot to enhance productivity, saving up to 2,200 hours monthly.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Microsoft 365 Copilot directly enabled automation of tasks resulting in monthly time savings

value_claims.claim_title: MAIRE saved more than 800 working hours per month

value_claims.claim_title: Tüpraş employees save more than an hour daily

value_claims.attribution_evidence: Microsoft 365 Copilot directly enabled automation and insights that produced daily time savings per employee

value_claims.claim_title: Access Holdings reduced code writing from 8 hours to 2 hours
value_claims.claim_description: Access Holdings Plc adopted Microsoft 365 Copilot, integrating generative AI into daily tools. Writing code now takes two hours instead of eight.
value_claims.source_quote: Access Holdings Plc adopted Microsoft 365 Copilot...writing code now takes two hours instead of eight
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Microsoft 365 Copilot directly enabled code generation capabilities that reduced coding time by 75%

value_claims.claim_title: Access Holdings reduced chatbot launch time from 3 months to 10 days
value_claims.claim_description: Access Holdings Plc adopted Microsoft 365 Copilot. Chatbots now launch in 10 days instead of three months.
value_claims.source_quote: chatbots launch in 10 days instead of three months
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Microsoft 365 Copilot directly enabled faster chatbot development reducing time from 90 days to 10 days

value_claims.claim_title: Access Holdings reduced presentation preparation from 6 hours to 45 minutes
value_claims.claim_description: Access Holdings Plc adopted Microsoft 365 Copilot. Presentations are now prepared in 45 minutes instead of six hours.
value_claims.source_quote: presentations are prepared in 45 minutes instead of six hours
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Microsoft 365 Copilot directly enabled faster presentation creation reducing time by 87.5%

value_claims.claim_title: Allpay increased developer productivity by 10% and delivery volume by 25%
value_claims.claim_description: Allpay uses GitHub Copilot to help engineers and developers write code faster and with less effort, increasing productivity by 10% and delivery volume into production by 25%.
value_claims.source_quote: Allpay uses GitHub Copilot to help engineers and developers write code faster...increasing productivity by 10% and delivery volume into production by 25%.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: GitHub Copilot directly enabled faster code writing resulting in measured productivity and delivery improvements
